title: Synergy Gaming Looking For Top Lane And Mid Laner For Competitive Tournaments

embed.description: Synergy Gaming. 26 likes Â· 10 talking about this. Sports Team

body:
Synergy Gaming is currently looking for  players and a coach for a serious esports team.
Please comment on this or private message us on our facebook page if you are interested.
Current team-

Top- TBC

Mid-TBC

Jg- UOW Farcry

ADC- Mo202

Support- Friendly Valen

replies.body:
Hi, I'm an amateur coach looking for a serious team. Here is the link to my post.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/NLK6xE7d-amateur-coach-lf-serious-team-pref-plat-players

A little more about me:
- I have my own Gold team in Singapore, where I'm the shotcaller.  I also regularly post stuff about game knowledge and/or things our team should focus on, in a private forum I created
- Currently coaching a Plat level team on a semi-regular basis
- I'm in talks with quite a few teams, and after viewing footage (including 3 Dia teams so far) I'm confident that I have something to offer at that level and beyond.

I'm looking for a team to challenge myself to the fullest extent, to be able to contribute and refine my skills at the same time, and your team sounds very promising.  I'd be happy to do an analysis on any replays you have, which I can then present as part of an "interview".

Cheers
i play mid what rank are you looking for ?
